trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when a method in the <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl"></xref> namespace attempts to enable a privilege that it does not have.
trans-unit.target: 中的方法时引发的异常<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl"></xref>命名空间尝试启用它不具有特权。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.PrivilegeNotHeldException"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.PrivilegeNotHeldException"></xref> class by using the specified privilege.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.PrivilegeNotHeldException"></xref>类通过使用指定的特权。

trans-unit.source: The privilege that is not enabled.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.PrivilegeNotHeldException"></xref> class by using the specified exception.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.PrivilegeNotHeldException"></xref>通过使用指定的异常类。

trans-unit.source: The privilege that is not enabled.
The exception that is the cause of the current exception.

If the `innerException` parameter is not a null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic), the current exception is raised in a <xref uid="langword_csharp_catch" name="catch" href=""></xref> block that handles the inner exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果`innerException`参数不是 null 引用 (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref>在 Visual Basic 中) 中, 引发当前异常<xref uid="langword_csharp_catch" name="catch" href=""></xref>处理内部异常的块。

trans-unit.source: Sets the info parameter with information about the exception.
trans-unit.target: 集 info 使用有关异常的信息的参数。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> that holds the serialized object data about the exception being thrown.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref>它保存关于所引发异常的序列化的对象数据。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> that contains contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>它包含有关源或目标的上下文信息。</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the privilege that is not enabled.
trans-unit.target: 获取未启用权限的名称。

trans-unit.source: The name of the privilege that the method failed to enable.
trans-unit.target: 该方法无法启用权限的名称。
